scripts.build: tsc && vite build && cp -r dist/assets/* ../backend/backend/static && cp dist/index.html ../backend/backend/templates/index.html
scripts.syncapi: cd ../backend && python manage.py generateschema --file ../frontend/src/django/schema.yml && cd ../frontend && npx openapi-typescript-codegen --input src/django/schema.yml --output src/api --indent 2
